profile.name: Syuan-Ying(Justin) Wu
profile.summary: He is an M.S. student in Computer Science at Virginia Tech, with over five years of experience in the software industry. His skill set includes a strong command of Java, Python, React, Node.js, NoSQL, and SQL, among other languages and tools. Throughout his career, he has successfully developed a range of systems and programs. He is currently working as a Graduate Assistant at Virginia Tech, where he is developing a threat detection system for the Washington D.C. area's metro.

experiences.title: Graduate Assistant
job_descriptions: Developed a threat detection system(in React, Node.js, and Python) to aid in earlier detection for Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority.
Improved the performance of NoSQL queries by the inverted index using Apache Solr.
Improved query time stability in shared MongoDB by restricting the number of documents retrieved per request, reducing response time from 1 minute to less than 1 second during limited resource times.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
job_descriptions: Developed credit card systems (in Java) for Taiwan Cooperative Bank and Mega Bank.
Optimized SQL scripts for the systems and data conversion, reducing the average response time of selecting transaction logs by 60% and the conversion time by 75%.
Led a project to convert all the programs from Procedure-Oriented Programming to the MVC design pattern and Object-Oriented Programming.
Fixed system vulnerabilities, such as SQL Injection, XSS, Path Traversal, etc.
Designed and developed login and logout programs using LDAP.
Developed common functions of data conversion programs for multiple protocols.

experiences.title: System Coordinator
experiences.company: New Taipei City Government Tourism and Travel Department
job_descriptions: Developed a Python program to automatically modify timestamps in GPS files, reducing the time from 4 hours to just 1 second.
Resolved a budget problem caused by Google Maps revision, saving $4,000 per year.
Wrote a bash script to help colleagues back up their files and prevent data loss.
Led a project to build a chatbot for a chatting app with cooperators.
Managed and redesigned the city's tourism websites, increasing visitor numbers by 10,000.
